### Chris: Advanced microdata analysis

```{r Chris: microdata analysis}
# Load packages
library(dplyr)
library(timetk)

# Loading the microdata
CTIS_microdata <- readRDS("data/protected_data/CTIS_microdata_cleanV3.RDS")

# Create 2nd dataset without NAs
CTIS_microdata_WO_NA <- CTIS_microdata[complete.cases(CTIS_microdata[, c("D1", "E4")]), ]

# Number of distinct dates
length(unique(as.Date(CTIS_microdata$RecordedDate)))

# tables for faster plotting:
table_D1 <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(D1) %>%
  group_by(D1) %>%
  summarise(n = n()) %>%
  mutate(perc = n / sum(n))

table_D1_WO_NA <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(D1) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  group_by(D1) %>%
  summarise(n = n()) %>%
  mutate(perc = n / sum(n))

table_D1_E4 <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(D1, E4) %>%
  group_by(E4, D1) %>%
  summarise(n = n()) %>%
  mutate(perc = n / sum(n))

table_D1_E4_WO_NA <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(D1, E4) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  group_by(E4, D1) %>%
  summarise(n = n()) %>%
  mutate(perc = n / sum(n))

table_D1_E8 <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(D1, E8) %>%
  group_by(E8, D1) %>%
  summarise(n = n()) %>%
  mutate(perc = n / sum(n))

table_D1_E8_WO_NA <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(D1, E8) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  group_by(E8, D1) %>%
  summarise(n = n()) %>%
  mutate(perc = n / sum(n))

table_D1_E3 <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(D1, E3) %>%
  group_by(E3, D1) %>%
  summarise(n = n()) %>%
  mutate(perc = n / sum(n))

table_D1_E3_WO_NA <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(D1, E3) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  group_by(E3, D1) %>%
  summarise(n = n()) %>%
  mutate(perc = n / sum(n))

table_D1_D7a <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(D1, D7a) %>%
  group_by(D7a, D1) %>%
  summarise(n = n()) %>%
  mutate(perc = n / sum(n))

table_D1_D7a_WO_NA <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(D1, D7a) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  group_by(D7a, D1) %>%
  summarise(n = n()) %>%
  mutate(perc = n / sum(n))


table_NA_D1_Date <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(RecordedDate, D1) %>%
  filter(is.na(D1)) %>%
  summarise_by_time(.date_var = RecordedDate,
                    .by = "day",
                    count_NA = n())

table_NA_E4_Date <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(RecordedDate, E4) %>%
  filter(is.na(E4)) %>%
  summarise_by_time(.date_var = RecordedDate,
                    .by = "day",
                    count_NA = n())

table_NA_E8_Date <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(RecordedDate, E8) %>%
  filter(is.na(E8)) %>%
  summarise_by_time(.date_var = RecordedDate,
                    .by = "day",
                    count_NA = n())

table_NA_E3_Date <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(RecordedDate, E3) %>%
  filter(is.na(E3)) %>%
  summarise_by_time(.date_var = RecordedDate,
                    .by = "day",
                    count_NA = n())

table_NA_D7a_Date <- CTIS_microdata %>%

  summarise_by_time(.date_var = RecordedDate,
                    .by = "day",
                    count_NA = n())

table_Obs_D1_Date <- CTIS_microdata %>%

  summarise_by_time(.date_var = RecordedDate,
                    .by = "day",
                    count = n())

table_Obs_E4_Date <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(RecordedDate, E4) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  summarise_by_time(.date_var = RecordedDate,
                    .by = "day",
                    count = n())

table_Obs_E8_Date <- CTIS_microdata %>%

  drop_na() %>%
  summarise_by_time(.date_var = RecordedDate,
                    .by = "day",
                    count = n())

table_Obs_E3_Date <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(RecordedDate, E3) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  summarise_by_time(.date_var = RecordedDate,
                    .by = "day",
                    count = n())

table_Obs_D7a_Date <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(RecordedDate, D7a) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  summarise_by_time(.date_var = RecordedDate,
                    .by = "day",
                    count = n())


table_D1_Date <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(RecordedDate, D1) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  group_by(D1) %>%
  summarise_by_time(.date_var = RecordedDate,
                    .by = "week",
                    n = n()) %>%
  group_by(RecordedDate) %>%
  mutate(perc = n/sum(n))

table_D1_weekday_abs <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(RecordedDate, D1) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  mutate(day_of_week = wday(RecordedDate, label = TRUE)) %>%
  select(day_of_week, D1) %>%
  group_by(day_of_week) %>%
  summarise(n = n())

table_D1_weekday_rel <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(RecordedDate, D1) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  mutate(day_of_week = wday(RecordedDate, label = TRUE)) %>%
  select(day_of_week, D1) %>%
  group_by(day_of_week, D1) %>%
  summarise(n = n()) %>%
  mutate(perc = n/sum(n))



table_D1_E4_Date <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(RecordedDate, D1, E4) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  group_by(E4, D1) %>%
  summarise_by_time(.date_var = RecordedDate,
                    .by = "week",
                    n = n()) %>%
  group_by(E4, RecordedDate) %>%
  mutate(perc = n/sum(n))

table_D1_E8_Date <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(RecordedDate, D1, E8) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  group_by(E8, D1) %>%
  summarise_by_time(.date_var = RecordedDate,
                    .by = "week",
                    n = n()) %>%
  group_by(E8, RecordedDate) %>%
  mutate(perc = n/sum(n))

table_D1_E3_Date <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(RecordedDate, D1, E3) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  group_by(E3, D1) %>%
  summarise_by_time(.date_var = RecordedDate,
                    .by = "week",
                    n = n()) %>%
  group_by(E3, RecordedDate) %>%
  mutate(perc = n/sum(n))

table_D1_D7a_Date <- CTIS_microdata %>%
  select(RecordedDate, D1, D7a) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  group_by(D7a, D1) %>%
  summarise_by_time(.date_var = RecordedDate,
                    .by = "week",
                    n = n()) %>%
  group_by(D7a, RecordedDate) %>%
  mutate(perc = n/sum(n))


# Plots with tables ----------------------------------------------------------------

# Plot: D1 (nervous)
ggplot(table_D1, aes(x = D1, y = perc)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  labs(title = "D1 (nervous)", 
       y = "relative frequencies")
ggsave("Plots/Chris/table_data/D1_barplot.png", width = 12, height = 9)

ggplot(table_D1_WO_NA, aes(x = D1, y = perc)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  labs(title = "D1 (nervous) - no NAs", 
       y = "relative frequencies")
ggsave("Plots/Chris/table_data/NO_NA_D1_barplot.png", width = 12, height = 9)

# Plot: D1 (nervous) vs. weekdays - abs
ggplot(data = table_D1_weekday_abs, mapping = aes(x = day_of_week, y = n)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  labs(title = "D1 (nervous) vs. weekdays - absolute", 
       x = "Day of the week",
       y = "Count of D1 (nervous)")
ggsave("Plots/Chris/table_data/D1_vs_weekday_abs.png", width = 12, height = 9)

# Plot: D1 (nervous) vs. weekdays - rel
ggplot(data = table_D1_weekday_rel, mapping = aes(x = day_of_week, y = n)) +
  geom_bar(mapping = aes(fill = D1), position = "dodge", stat = "identity") +
  labs(title = "D1 (nervous) vs. weekdays - relative", 
       x = "Day of the week",
       y = "Count",) + 
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Blues", name = "D1 (nervous)")
ggsave("Plots/Chris/table_data/D1_vs_weekday_rel.png", width = 12, height = 9)

  geom_bar() +
  facet_wrap(~E4)

barplot_D1vsE4 <- ggplot(data = CTIS_microdata, aes(x = D1, group = E4)) + 
  geom_bar(aes(y = ..prop..), stat="count") + 
  scale_y_continuous(labels=scales::percent) +
  ylab("relative frequencies") +
  facet_wrap(~E4) +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(title = "D1 (nervous) vs E4 (Age)")
ggsave(filename = "Plots/Chris/D1vsE4barplot.png", 
       plot = barplot_D1vsE4, width = 12, height = 12)
```
